posts.post_content:
Affordable card of that famous, banned fella. 

Clipped top R corner and severed L bottom corner. Image is clear, back is quite clean with a wee bit of foxing. $395. Priority/Insured on me. Thanks, Steve [url]fdnyladder7@comcast.net[/url]


Sorry, no scanner and my apologies for the crappy photo. Card looks great in hand. 
[IMG]http://i30.photobucket.com/albums/c327/oche16/1919%20Black%20Sox/fatclv-1.jpg[/IMG]
